meanings.sent1: The unchronological photo album confused me.
meanings.sent2: Her unchronological storytelling style kept us on our toes.
meanings.sent3: The unchronological movie plot had us scratching our heads.
meanings.sent4: His unchronological approach to history was like a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The unchronological events in the story made it hard to follow.

meanings.definition: Not following a timeline or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The unchronological events in the book were unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The unchronological nature of the dream made it surreal.
meanings.sent3: The unchronological order of the songs at the concert was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her unchronological thoughts were like scattered puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The unchronological sequence of events created a sense of chaos.
